Parameters: boolean
boolean: True if this is a self-change notification.
dispatchChange(boolean).Description: Use @B_android#database#ContentObserver#dispatchChange_E@ instead. Dispatches a change notification to the observer. If a @B_android#os#Handler_E@ was supplied to the @B_android#database#ContentObserver_E@ constructor, then a call to the @B_android#database#ContentObserver#onChange_E@ method is posted to the handler's message queue. Otherwise, the @B_android#database#ContentObserver#onChange_E@ method is invoked immediately on this thread.
dispatchChange(boolean).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 16

Parameters: boolean
boolean: True if this is a self-change notification.
@B_android#net#Uri_E@
Uri: The Uri of the changed content, or null if unknown.
dispatchChange(boolean, android.net.Uri).Description: Dispatches a change notification to the observer. Includes the changed content Uri when available. If a @B_android#os#Handler_E@ was supplied to the @B_android#database#ContentObserver_E@ constructor, then a call to the @B_android#database#ContentObserver#onChange_E@ method is posted to the handler's message queue. Otherwise, the @B_android#database#ContentObserver#onChange_E@ method is invoked immediately on this thread.
dispatchChange(boolean, android.net.Uri).FullName: public final void dispatchChange (boolean selfChange, Uri uri)

Parameters: boolean
boolean: True if this is a self-change notification.
@B_android#net#Uri_E@
Uri: The Uri of the changed content, or null if unknown.
onChange(boolean,android.net.Uri).Description: This method is called when a content change occurs. Includes the changed content Uri when available. Subclasses should override this method to handle content changes. To ensure correct operation on older versions of the framework that did not provide a Uri argument, applications should also implement the @B_android#database#ContentObserver#onChange_E@ overload of this method whenever they implement the @B_android#database#ContentObserver#onChange_E@ overload. Example implementation:
onChange(boolean,android.net.Uri).FullName: public void onChange (boolean selfChange, Uri uri)

Parameters: @B_android#os#Handler_E@
Handler: The handler to run @B_android#database#ContentObserver#onChange_E@ on, or null if none.

Returns: True if self-change notifications should be delivered to the observer.
deliverSelfNotifications().Description: Returns true if this observer is interested receiving self-change notifications. Subclasses should override this method to indicate whether the observer is interested in receiving notifications for changes that it made to the content itself.

ClassDesc: Receives call backs for changes to content. Must be implemented by objects which are added to a @B_android#database#ContentObservable_E@.
